attributes.action: Why should the black boy pub Retford loose its name after all these years
attributes.additional_details: We don’t want to have to change the name of our local pub in Retford, after all it has history, it doesn’t matter what colour you are everyone is made welcome in here, I thinks it a shame that the landlords should fork out money to change signs and name etc when this is a great social meeting point for a lot of our community
attributes.background: Not make the landlords change the name of this amazing pub
